entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
